title: DevMeet - Social Network For Developers (MERN)
content: In this project I got inspired from a tutorial and the Twitter platform which is what I was aiming for at the beginning, I'v learned and solved many problems during this project and committed every single step in Github, yet I don't consider it as a finished project although everything works great, But simply I always like to check on my projects once in a while and add new features.

title: PetMe - Dog Adoption Association (MEAN)
content: In this project I got inspired from Klavlav website, The project is not related to my studying at HackerU neither a tutorial, I'v built everything on my own, Front to back and along the process I had many challenging problems , learned new strategies and libraries, worked with Git & GitHub ( issues , commits , Pull requests etc).

title: BizUp - Business Meetups (MERN)
content: This project was the first MERN project I did during my studing at HackerU college. I'v took me time to do this project as it was also out final assignment from the college , I'v learned a lot and got inspired to do my own college free MERN project.

title: CRM - Company CRM (Angular & Firebase)
content: This was my first project involving Angular and Firebase togather, It was a project during my studying at college as well which was give to us as an assignment which instructions and photos of how the UI should look like. I'v learned a lot about firebase as it was my first encounter with it in this project.

title: Portfolio - Front End website (React & CSS)
content: I've to start that I did everything here with a tremendous amount of passion, Not that any of my project was without passion but in this one preticulary I had to prove that I'm really creative as I say in my resume and tried to add as many cool stuff, animations, colors and simply a great touch to attract viewer's eyes, hopefully I've succeeded

title: Mardi Grass - Static Website (HTML/CSS/JS)
content: This is actually my first website ever in code, and by that I mean from scartch as I did made websites before this but all of them were using websites builders, This was a static website during my studing and it purpse was to test our HTML/CSS and a little JS

title: Smartechs - Gadgets E-commerce Shop
content: Smart Techs is ​​a digital gadgets store built in Wordpress and woocoomerce that supplies all sorts of brilliant products and accessories for all kinds of uses

title: QNWMedia - Branding Agency
content: QNW is a service company to financial organizations specializing in Online Marketing. The company was founded in 2020 and since than developed variety of applications, tools and websites.

title: PatronLTD - Construction Company
content: The technological revolution is changing aspect of our lives, and the fabric of society itself. it's also changing the way we learn and what we learn. Factual knowledge is less prized when everything you ever need to know can be found on your phone. There's no imperative to be an expert at doing everything when you can.
